mapper.sql: resource_id, path, url, name, pid, code, icon, type, serailno
mapper.insert: insert into resource (resource_id, path, url, name, pid, code, icon, type, serailno) values (#{resource_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serailno,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into resource
resource_id,
path,
url,
name,
pid,
code,
icon,
type,
serailno,
#{resource_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update resource
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serailno = #{serailno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where resource_id = #{resource_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update resource set path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serailno = #{serailno,jdbcType=INTEGER} where resource_id = #{resource_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource.resource_id, resource.path, resource.url, resource.name, resource.pid, resource.code, resource.icon, resource.type, resource.serailno FROM resource Left Join permisson_resoucre ON resource.resource_id = permisson_resoucre.resource_id Left Join premission ON permisson_resoucre.permisson_id = premission.permisson_id Left Join role_permisson ON premission.permisson_id = role_permisson.permisson_id Inner Join role ON role_permisson.role_id = role.role_id where role.role_id = #{role_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT resource.resource_id, resource.path, resource.url, resource.name, resource.pid, resource.code, resource.icon, resource.`type`, resource.serailno, premission.permisson_id, premission.permisson, premission.name as permisson_name , premission.description as permisson_description, premission.is_show as permisson_is_show FROM resource Left Join permisson_resoucre ON resource.resource_id = permisson_resoucre.resource_id Left Join premission ON permisson_resoucre.permisson_id = premission.permisson_id where resource.resource_id = #{resource_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
